price: De: “Əgər Allah yanında Axirət yurdu digər insanlara deyil, yalnız sizin üçün hazırlanıbsa və bu (iddianızda) doğrusunuzsa, onda (özünüzə) ölüm diləyin!”
arabic: قُلۡ إِن كَانَتۡ لَكُمُ ٱلدَّارُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَالِصَةٗ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنَّاسِ فَتَمَنَّوُاْ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul in kānat lakumu al-dāru al-ākhiratu ʿinda al-lahi khāliṣatan min dūni al-nāsi fatamannawū al-mawta in kuntum ṣādiqīna
